answers.answer: Hi,It is important to correlate this finding with the clinical symptoms. This type of finding is seen in patients with chronic headache, migraines, high BP, High cholesterol, diabetes, smoking, alcoholism, MS and Alzheimers disease and encephalitis.Thanks

question: What does a hyperintense signal abnormality detected in the right subcortial white matter on image in mri mean?
title: abnormal brain mri
